name: Sales Person Monthly Target
query:
SELECT
    `tabSales Person`.name as "Sales Person:Link/Sales Person:150",
    `tabSales Person`.average_target as "Average Target:Currency:150",
    `tabSales Person`.target as "Real Target:Currency:150",
	(select sum(net_amount) 
	from `tabSales Invoice Item` join `tabSales Invoice` 
	on `tabSales Invoice Item`.parent = `tabSales Invoice`.name
	where `tabSales Invoice`.docstatus = 1
	and `tabSales Invoice Item`.is_stock_item = 1 
	and `tabSales Invoice`.sales_person = `tabSales Person`.name
	and `tabSales Invoice`.posting_date between %(from_date)s and %(to_date)s) as "Acheived Amount:Currency:150",
	
	    100*((select sum(net_amount) 
	from `tabSales Invoice Item` join `tabSales Invoice` 
	on `tabSales Invoice Item`.parent = `tabSales Invoice`.name
	where `tabSales Invoice`.docstatus = 1
	and `tabSales Invoice Item`.is_stock_item = 1 
	and `tabSales Invoice`.sales_person = `tabSales Person`.name
	and `tabSales Invoice`.posting_date between %(from_date)s and %(to_date)s) / (`tabSales Person`.target)) as "Percentage:Percent:100", 
    
    ((select sum(net_amount) 
	from `tabSales Invoice Item` join `tabSales Invoice` 
	on `tabSales Invoice Item`.parent = `tabSales Invoice`.name
	where `tabSales Invoice`.docstatus = 1
	and `tabSales Invoice Item`.is_stock_item = 1 
	and `tabSales Invoice`.sales_person = `tabSales Person`.name
	and `tabSales Invoice`.posting_date between %(from_date)s and %(to_date)s)) - (`tabSales Person`.target) as "Remaining Amount:Currency:150"

FROM
	`tabSales Person`

WHERE
    `tabSales Person`.parent != "Projects Sales"
	
ORDER BY
    100*((select sum(net_amount) 
	from `tabSales Invoice Item` join `tabSales Invoice` 
	on `tabSales Invoice Item`.parent = `tabSales Invoice`.name
	where `tabSales Invoice`.docstatus = 1
	and `tabSales Invoice Item`.is_stock_item = 1 
	and `tabSales Invoice`.sales_person = `tabSales Person`.name
	and `tabSales Invoice`.posting_date between %(from_date)s and %(to_date)s) / (`tabSales Person`.target)) desc
